      • translateUrl

        public java.net.URL translateUrl(java.net.URL url)
        Description copied from interface: UrlTranslationStrategy
        Translates a resource url into the actual url on the system. If this strategy cannot translate the resouce url, then this method should return null.
        Specified by:
        translateUrl in interface UrlTranslationStrategy
